name: Portland Clutch 007wr
description:
This a beautiful clutch purse that is interchangeable! This bag can be detached from the handles and washed or switched for a different bag.

	You are buying the bag and the handles.

	Please note when buying if you prefer silver (pictured left) or bronze handles.

	There is an 11” zippered pocket that runs along one side of the bag. The pocket is 3.5” deep.

	Machine Washable, lay flat to dry.

	Material: Cotton Fabric and Polyester Grosgrain Ribbon.

	Dimensions: 12” x 9”, Please see the photo above for more specific information.

	blog &website: www.laniha.com – coming soon!

name: Portland Clutch - FLUID series
description: This is one of a kind purse! The detail on both the front and the back of the clutch are stitched on by me! So even if I make others, no two will be alike. This is a Portland Clutch FLUID series Bag. Handles: •Silver handles pictured. Bronze handles are available. Clutch Purse: •Interchangeable (The bag can be detached from the handles and switched for a different bag.) •You are buying the bag and the handles. •Due to the delicate nature of the appliqué, I do not recommend any bag from the FLUID series be machine washed. •Material: Cotton Fabric, Wool Yarn, Acrylic Yarn and Polyester Grosgrain Ribbon. •Dimensions: 12” x 9” Please note, unlike the other Portland Clutch Bags, there is no zippered pocket. blog & website: www.laniha.com – coming soon!
